name: Tomato Pizza
description: Our specialty pizza, made with sundried tomatoes, our homemade pesto, and other secret ingredients.

name: Deluxe Tofu Soup
description: A tofu soup topped with portabella mushrooms, carrots, noodles and assorted greens.

name: Poached Toast
description: Delicious avocado spread, spinach, and poached egg on toast.

name: Choco Pancake Stack
description: A stack of fluffy pancakes drizzle in our locally imported maple syrup, topped with  delicious chocolate crumbs.

name: Berry Cheesecake
description: A rich cheesecake with a chocolate-flavored crust, topped with berries and drizzled in chocolate syrup.

name: Assorted Skewers
description: Three skewers with assorted meat cooked on the grill, which can be shrimp, chicken, or pork.

name: Cinnamon Shortbread
description: A freshly baked cinnamon shortbread drizzled with chocolate syrup.

name: Hamburger
description: A hamburger with a 1/2 pound patty on a broiche bun, including lettuce, tomatoes, onions, and cheddar cheese.

name: Meat Pasta
description: A delicious bolognese sauce with angel hair pasta.

name: Pink Cocktail
description: A fruity cocktail flavored with passion fruit, orange, watermelon, and pink lemonade.

name: Mornin' Joe
description: Signature capuccino drink, topped with a hint of sweetened condensed milk.

name: Grilled Chicken Burrito
description: Flavorful burrito with garlic-based seasoning on grilled chicken, as well as steaming cold-rice, peppers, onions, and tomatoes.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: A hearty bowl of tomato basil soup with sun dried tomatoes and lots of garlic.

name: Sweet Potato Fries
description: Thin sweet potato fries topped with herbs and cheese.
